00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00107 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00108 {
00109     double ans = 0;
00110     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00111     return ans;
00112 }
00113 
00126 static R_INLINE double*
00127 apply_perm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00128 {
00129     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[i] = src[perm ? perm[i] : i];
00130     return dest;
00131 }
00132 
00145 static R_INLINE double*
00146 apply_iperm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00147 {
00148     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[perm ? perm[i] : i] = src[i];
00149     return dest;
00150 }

00160 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00161 {
00162     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00163     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00164     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00165 }

00178 static R_INLINE double *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)
00179 {
00180     SEXP pt = GET_SLOT(obj, nm);
00181     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;
00182 }

00184 /* FIXME: Instead of this function add elements sigmaML and sigmaREML
00185  * to the deviance slot and fill them whenever d[pwrss_POS] changes.
00186  */
00195 static R_INLINE double
00196 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* d)
00197 {
00198     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? 
00199             sqrt(d[pwrss_POS] / (dims[n_POS] -
00200                             (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))) : 1);
00201 }

00216 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00217 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00218 {
00219     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00220 
00221     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00222         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00223         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00224 
00225         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00226         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00227         nc[i] = nci;
00228         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00229     }
00230     return ans;
00231 }
00232 
00242 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00243 {
00244     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00245     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00246         *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x),
00247         i, i1 = 1, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00248     int p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00249     double *b = RANEF_SLOT(x),
00250         *u = U_SLOT(x), one = 1;
00251     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00252     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00253     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00254     R_CheckStack(); 
00255 
00256     if (!SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym)) { /* LMM */
00257         double *rx = RX_SLOT(x),
00258             *rzx = RZX_SLOT(x),
00259             *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00260             *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
00261             mone = -1, one = 1;
00262         CHM_DN cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1), sol;
00263         R_CheckStack();
00264                                 /* solve RX beta-hat = del2 */
00265         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, rx, &p, fixef, &i1);
00266         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, rzx, &q,
00267                         fixef, &i1, &one, u, &i1);
00268         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00269             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00270         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00271         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00272         d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00273         d[wrss_POS] = d[disc_POS] = d[pwrss_POS] - d[usqr_POS];
00274     }
00275     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00276                                 /* inverse permutation */
00277     for (i = 0; i < q; i++) b[((int*)L->Perm)[i]] = u[i];
00278     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00279         for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00280             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00281             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00282             for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00283         }
00284         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00285             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00286                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00287         }
00288     }
00289 }
00290 
00300 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00301 {
00302     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00303         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00304         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00305         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00306     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00307         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00308     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00309         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00310         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00311     R_CheckStack();
00312     
00313     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00314     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00315     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00316     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00317         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00318         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00319             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00320             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00321                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00322             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00323         }
00324     }
00325     return R_NilValue;
00326 }
00327 
00336 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00337 {
00338     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00339     int i, nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00340     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00341         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00342         double *st = REAL(STi);
00343         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00344         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00345 
00346         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00347             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00348         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00349             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00350                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00351     }
00352     return pars;
00353 }

00362 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00363 {
00364     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS]));
00365     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00366 
00367     UNPROTECT(1); 
00368     return ans;
00369 }
00370 
00378 static void
00379 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00380 {
00381     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00382     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
00383     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym)),
00384         cZt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
00385     int *vi = (int*)(cC->i), *vp = (int*)(cC->p),
00386         *zi = (int*)(cZt->i), *zp = (int*)(cZt->p),
00387         i, j, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST), p, pos = 0;
00388     int vnnz = vp[cC->ncol], znnz = zp[cZt->ncol];
00389     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00390     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00391         *vx = (double*)(cC->x), *zx = (double*)(cZt->x),
00392         one[] = {1,0};
00393     R_CheckStack();
00394 
00395     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00396                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00397     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00398         int j, k, nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00399         double *sti = st[i];
00400 
00401         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00402             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00403         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00404             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00405                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00406     }
00407                                 /* Copy Z' to V' unless V' has nonzero
00408                                  * positions not in Z' */ 
00409     if (vnnz == znnz) Memcpy(vx, zx, znnz); 
00410     else { /* Only occurs in nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00411         AZERO(vx, vnnz);        /* Initialize the potential nonzeros to 0 */
00412         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00413             int pv = vp[j];
00414             for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00415                 while (vi[pv] < zi[p]) pv++;      /* matching pos in V' */
00416                 if (vi[pv] != zi[p])
00417                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and C structures, j = %d"), j);
00418                 vx[pv] = zx[p];
00419             }
00420         }
00421     }
00422                                 /* When T != I multiply C on the left by T' */
00423     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00424         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00425             for (p = vp[j]; p < vp[j + 1];) {
00426                 int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00427 
00428                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00429                 else {
00430                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00431                     while ((vi[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00432                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00433                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00434                                     one, st[i], nc + i, vx + p, &nr);
00435                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00436                 }
00437             }
00438                                 /* Multiply C on the left by S */
00439     for (p = 0; p < vnnz; p++) {
00440         int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00441         vx[p] *= st[i][((vi[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00442     }
00443 }

00458     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00459         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00460     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00461     return R_NilValue;

00472 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00473 {
00474     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x),
00475         w = LENGTH(which) ? asInteger(which) : 0;
00476     
00477     return ScalarReal(get_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && dims[isREML_POS]), dims,
00478                                 DEV_SLOT(x)));
00479 }
00480 
00488 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
00489 {
00490     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00491         *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00492     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00493     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00494     int i, j, k;
00495     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
00496     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00497     CHM_DN dm1;
00498     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00499     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00500         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00501     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00502     R_CheckStack();
00503 
00504     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00505     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00506     sc = get_sigma(dims[isREML_POS], dims, DEV_SLOT(x));
00507     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00508         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00509         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00510                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00511                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00512 
00513         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00514         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00515         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00516         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00517             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00518         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00519             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00520             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00521                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + k + j * nlev[i]];
00522             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00523             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00524             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00525             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00526             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00527             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00528             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00529             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00530             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00531                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00532                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00533                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00534                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00535             }
00536         }
00537         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00538     }
00539     UNPROTECT(1);
00540     return ans;
00541 }
00542 
00551 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP CmP)
00552 {
00553     double one[] = {1, 0};
00554     CHM_SP Cm = AS_CHM_SP(CmP);
00555     CHM_FR L;
00556     R_CheckStack();
00557 
00558     L = M_cholmod_analyze(Cm, &c);
00559     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Cm, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00560         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00561               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00562 
00563     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00564 }
00565 
00566 
00567 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00568 
00569 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00570 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00571 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00572 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00573 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;
00574 
00575 static void
00576 lme4_muEta(double* mu, double* muEta, const double* eta, int n, int typ)
00577 {
00578     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* apply the generalized linear part */
00579         double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00580         switch(typ) {
00581         case 1:         /* logit */
00582             tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00583             ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00584             mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00585             muEta[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00586             break;
00587         case 2:         /* probit */
00588             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00589                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00590                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00591             }
00592             mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00593                 ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00594                  pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00595             tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00596             muEta[i] = (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00597             break;
00598         case 3:         /* cauchit */
00599             error(_("cauchit link not yet coded"));
00600             break;
00601         case 4:         /* cloglog */
00602             error(_("cloglog link not yet coded"));
00603             break;
00604         case 5:         /* identity */
00605             mu[i] = eta[i];
00606             muEta[i] = 1.;
00607             break;
00608         case 6:         /* log */
00609             tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00610             muEta[i] = mu[i] =
00611                 (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00612             break;
00613         case 7:         /* sqrt */
00614             mu[i] = etai * etai;
00615             muEta[i] = 2 * etai;
00616             break;
00617         default:
00618             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00619         }
00620     }
00621 }
00622 
00623 static void
00624 lme4_varFunc(double* var, const double* mu, int n, int vTyp)
00625 {
00626     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00627         double mui = mu[i];
00628         switch(vTyp) {
00629         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00630             var[i] = 1.;
00631             break;
00632         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00633             if (mui <= 0 || mui >= 1)
00634                 error(_("mu[i] must be in the range (0,1): mu = %g, i = %d"),
00635                       mu, i);
00636             var[i] = mui * (1 - mui);
00637             break;
00638         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00639             if (mui <= 0)
00640                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00641             var[i] = mui;
00642             break;
00643         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00644             if (mui <= 0)
00645                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00646             var[i] = mui * mui;
00647             break;
00648         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00649             if (mui <= 0)
00650                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00651             var[i] = mui * mui * mui;
00652             break;
00653         default:
00654             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00655         }
00656     }
00657 }
00658 
00667 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00668 {
00669     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00670 }
00671 
00672 static double
00673 lme4_devResid(const double* mu, const double* pWt, const double* y,
00674               int n, int vTyp)
00675 {
00676     double ans = 0.;
00677     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00678         double mui = mu[i], wi = pWt ? pWt[i] : 1, yi = y[i];
00679         double ri = yi - mui;
00680         switch(vTyp) {
00681         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00682             ans += wi * ri * ri;
00683             break;
00684         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00685             ans += 2 * wi *
00686                 (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00687             break;
00688         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00689             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00690             break;
00691         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00692             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui)/mui);
00693             break;
00694         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00695             ans += wi * (ri * ri)/(yi * mui * mui);
00696             break;
00697         default:
00698             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00699         }
00700     }
00701     return ans;
00702 }
00703 
00713 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00714 {
00715     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00716     int i, i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00717     int ns = n * s;
00718     double *V = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym),
00719         *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00720         *eta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym)),
00721         *etaold = (double*) NULL,
00722         *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
00723         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00724         *offset = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00725         *srwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym),
00726         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00727         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00728         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00729         one[] = {1,0};
00730     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00731     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00732     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta, cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
00733     R_CheckStack();
00734 
00735     if (V) {
00736         etaold = eta;
00737         eta = Calloc(ns, double);
00738     }
00739                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00740     for (i = 0; i < ns; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
00741                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00742     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &ns, &p, one,
00743                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)), &ns,
00744                     FIXEF_SLOT(x), &i1,
00745                     one, eta, &i1);
00746                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00747     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00748     ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, ns, 1);
00749     R_CheckStack();
00750     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(cC, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00751         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00752     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00753 
00754     if (V) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00755         SEXP pnames = VECTOR_ELT(GET_DIMNAMES(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym)), 1),
00756             gg, rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym), vv;
00757         int *gdims;
00758         
00759         if (!isString(pnames) || LENGTH(pnames) != s)
00760             error(_("Slot V must be a matrix with %d named columns"), s);
00761         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00762             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00763                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00764             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00765                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00766                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00767             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00768         }
00769         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00770         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00771             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00772         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00773         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00774             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00775         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00776         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00777             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00778                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00779                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00780                                  * pnames has been checked */
00781         Free(eta);
00782         eta = etaold;
00783         Memcpy(eta, REAL(vv), n);
00784         Memcpy(V, REAL(gg), ns);
00785         UNPROTECT(1);
00786     }
00787 
00788     if (muEta) {
00789         lme4_muEta(mu, muEta, eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
00790         lme4_varFunc(var, mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
00791     } else {
00792         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00793     }
00794 
00795     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00796     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00797         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1);
00798         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00799     }
00800                                 /* store u'u */
00801     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00802     return (d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS]);
00803 }
00804 
00815 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00816 {
00817     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00818 }
00819 
00830 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00831 {
00832     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00833     int n = dims[n_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00834     double
00835         *V = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym),
00836         *cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
00837         *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00838         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00839         *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
00840         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00841         *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_pWtSym),
00842         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
00843         *srwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym),
00844         *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00845         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00846         one[] = {1,0};
00847     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00848     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00849     R_CheckStack();
00850     
00851     if (var || pwt) {      /* Update srwt and res. Reevaluate wrss. */
00852         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00853         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00854             srwt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
00855             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00856             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00857         }
00858     }
00859     if (sXwt) {                 /* Update sXwt and C */
00860         int *ai = (int*)A->i, *ap = (int*)A->p, i, j;
00861         double *ax = (double*)(A->x);
00862         CHM_SP C = A;
00863 
00864         for (j = 0; j < s; j++) {
00865             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00866                 int ja = i + j * n;
00867                 sXwt[ja] = (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1) *
00868                     (muEta ? muEta[i] : 1) *
00869                     (V ? V[ja] : 1);
00870             }
00871         }
00872         if (s == 1) {           /* C is a scaled version of A */
00873             for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00874                 for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00875                     cx[p] = ax[p] * sXwt[j];
00876             A->x = (void*)cx;
00877         } else {
00878             int *ci, *cp, pa, pc;
00879             C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00880             R_CheckStack();
00881 
00882             ci = (int*)C->i; cp = (int*)C->p; cx = (double*)C->x;
00883             AZERO(cx, cp[n]);
00884             for (j = 0; j < s; j++)
00885                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00886                     int ja = i + j * n;
00887                     for (pa = ap[ja]; pa < ap[ja + 1]; pa++) {
00888                         for (pc = cp[i]; pc < cp[i + 1]; pc++)
00889                             if (ci[pc] == ai[pa]) break;
00890                         if (pc >= cp[i + 1])
00891                             error(_("Structure of Cm and A are not consistent"));
00892                         cx[pc] += ax[pa] * sXwt[ja];
00893                     }
00894                 }
00895             A = C;
00896         }
00897     }
00898 
00899     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00900         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00901               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00902 
00903     d[ldL2_POS] = 0;            /* evaluate log(det(L))^2 */
00904     if (L->is_super) {
00905         int i;
00906         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00907             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00908                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00909             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00910 
00911             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00912                 d[ldL2_POS] += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00913             }
00914         }
00915     } else {
00916         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00917         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00918         
00919         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00920             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00921             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00922             d[ldL2_POS] += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00923         }
00924     }
00925     return (d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS]);
00926 }
00927 
00939 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00940 {
00941     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00942 }
00943 
00945 #define CM_MAXITER  300
00946 
00947 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
00948 
00949 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
00950 
00960 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
00961 {
00962     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00963     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00964     double *Cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
00965         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
00966         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
00967         *u = U_SLOT(x),
00968         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
00969         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, step;
00970     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double), *tmp1 = Alloca(q, double),
00971         *uold = Alloca(q, double), one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00972     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00973     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
00974         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
00975     CHM_SP C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00976     R_CheckStack();
00977     
00978     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
00979     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
00980     if (!sXwt) error(_("sqrtXWt slot is empty in update_u"));
00981     if (Cx) {               /* A and C have the same structure */
00982         C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00983         R_CheckStack();
00984         C->x = (void*)Cx;
00985     }
00986     
00987     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
00988      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
00989      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
00990      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
00991     AZERO(u, q);
00992     update_mu(x);
00993     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
00994         
00995         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
00996         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
00997                                 /* tmp := PC %*% wtdResid */
00998         M_cholmod_sdmult(C, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
00999         Memcpy(tmp1, tmp, q);
01000         apply_perm(tmp, tmp1, (int*)L->Perm, q);
01001                                 /* tmp := tmp - u */
01002         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] -= u[j];
01003                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01004         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01005             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01006         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01007         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01008                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01009         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
01010         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01011                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01012         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01013             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01014         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01015         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01016 
01017         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01018             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
01019             pwrss = update_mu(x);
01020             if (verb < 0)
01021                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01022                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
01023             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
01024                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
01025                 break;
01026             }
01027         }
01028         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01029     }
01030     return i;
01031 }
01032 
01044 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01045 {
01046     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
01047 }
01048 
01049 /* FIXME: change this to use the variance type slot.  If
01050  * dims[useSc_POS] is nonzero then use the formula for the profiled
01051  * deviance.  (Does everything work out nicely if sigma is identically
01052  * 1 when useSc is false?)
01053  */
01054 
01062 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01063 {
01064     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x);
01065     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01066 
01067     d[disc_POS] = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym) ?
01068         lme4_devResid(MU_SLOT(x),
01069                       REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pWtSym)),
01070                       REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01071                       dims[n_POS], dims[vTyp_POS]) :
01072         d[wrss_POS];
01073     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01074     return R_NilValue;
01075 }
01076 
01087 SEXP mer_update_ranef(SEXP x)
01088 {
01089     update_ranef(x);
01090     return R_NilValue;
01091 }
01092 
01103 static void
01104 P_sdmult(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01105          const double *X, int nc)
01106 {
01107     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), m = A->nrow, n = A->ncol;
01108     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(m, double);
01109     R_CheckStack();
01110 
01111     for (int k = 0; k < nc; k++) {
01112         AZERO(tmp, m);
01113         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01114             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01115                 tmp[ai[p]] += X[j + k * n] * ax[p];
01116         }
01117         apply_perm(dest + k * m, tmp, perm, m);
01118     }
01119 }
01120         
01129 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01130 {
01131     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm;
01132     int i, i1 = 1, j, k, n = dims[n_POS];
01133     int p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
01134     double *X = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)),
01135         *cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
01136         *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef,
01137         *rzxy, *rxy = RX_SLOT(x),
01138         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym), *u,
01139         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01140         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01141         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01142     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
01143     CHM_DN cRCXy = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RZXSym)), ans, cu;
01144     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01145     R_CheckStack();
01146 
01147     rzxy = (double*)cRCXy->x;
01148     perm = (int*)L->Perm;
01149     if (sXwt) {                 /* Create W^{1/2}GHX in WX */
01150         double *WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
01151 
01152         AZERO(WX, n * p);
01153         for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01154             for (k = 0; k < s; k++)
01155                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01156                     WX[i + j * n] +=
01157                         sXwt[i + k * n] * X[i + n * (k + j * s)];
01158         if (cx) A->x = (void*)cx;
01159         else {                  /* Replace A by C */
01160             A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01161             R_CheckStack();
01162         }
01163         X = WX;
01164     }
01165                                 /* initialize RZX to PAX */
01166     P_sdmult(rzxy, perm, A, X, p);
01167                                 /* initialize RX to X'X */
01168     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, one, X, &n, zero, rxy, &p);
01169                                 /* solve L %*% ans = PAW^{1/2}[X:y] */
01170     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRCXy, &c);
01171     Memcpy(rzxy, (double*)(ans->x), q * p);
01172     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01173                                 /* downdate X'X and factor  */
01174     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &q, mone, rzxy, &q, one, rxy, &p);
01175     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &p, rxy, &p, &j);
01176     if (j)
01177         error(_("Downdated X'X is not positive definite, %d."), j);
01178                                 /* accumulate log(det(RX)^2)  */
01179     for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < p; j++)
01180         d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(rxy[j * (p + 1)]);
01181 
01182     if (SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym) || SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) {
01183         Free(X);
01184         return d[ML_POS];
01185     }
01186                                 /* linear mixed models only */
01187     fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x);
01188     u = U_SLOT(x);
01189     cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1);
01190     R_CheckStack();
01191                                 /* solve L del1 = PAy */
01192     if (sXwt) {
01193         double *tmp = Calloc(n, double);
01194         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) tmp[i] = sXwt[i] * y[i];
01195         y = tmp;
01196     }
01197     P_sdmult(u, perm, A, y, 1);
01198     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cu, &c);
01199     Memcpy(u, (double*)ans->x, q);
01200     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01201                                 /* solve RX' del2 = X'y - RZX'del1 */
01202     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, one, X, &n, y, &i1, zero, fixef, &i1);
01203     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &q, &p, mone, rzxy, &q,
01204                     u, &i1, one, fixef, &i1);
01205     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "T", "N", &p, rxy, &p, fixef, &i1);
01206     d[pwrss_POS] = sqr_length(y, n)
01207         - (sqr_length(fixef, p) + sqr_length(u, q));
01208     if (d[pwrss_POS] < 0)
01209         error(_("Calculated PWRSS for a LMM is negative"));
01210     d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01211         dn * (1 + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2 * PI / dn));
01212     d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01213         dnmp * (1. + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01214 
01215     if (sXwt) Free(y);
01216     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01217 }
01218 
01226 SEXP
01227 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01228 {
01229     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01230 }
01231 
01241 SEXP 
01242 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01243 {
01244     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01245     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x),
01246         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01247     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01248                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym))),
01249         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01250 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe).
01251  * Not really but we do need to profile out the scale parameter when
01252  * useSc is TRUE. */
01253     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01254     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01255     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01256     double *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x);
01257     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01258     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01259         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01260     R_CheckStack();
01261 
01262     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01263     if (!lmm) {
01264         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01265 
01266         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01267         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01268         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01269         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01270     }
01271                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01272     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01273     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01274                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01275     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01276         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01277     }
01278                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01279     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01280         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01281         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01282         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01283     }
01284     do {
01285         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01286 /* FIXME: Change this so that update_dev is always called and that
01287  * function does the selection of methods based on lmm. The Memcpy
01288  * call should always be used but the number of values to copy can be
01289  * zero. */
01290         if (lmm) {
01291             update_L(x);
01292             fx = update_RX(x);
01293         } else {
01294             
01295             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01296             update_u(x, verb);
01297             mer_update_dev(x);
01298             fx = DEV_SLOT(x)[ML_POS];
01299         }
01300         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01301     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01302     update_RX(x);
01303     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01304     return R_NilValue;
01305 }
01306 
01307 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01308 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01309 
01322 static double
01323 *std_rWishart_factor(double df, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01324 {
01325     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01326 
01327     if (df < (double) p || p <= 0)
01328         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01329     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01330         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(df - (double) j));
01331         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01332             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01333                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01334             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01335             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01336         }
01337     }
01338     return ans;
01339 }
01340 
01350 SEXP
01351 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP dfp, SEXP scal)
01352 {
01353     SEXP ans;
01354     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01355         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01356     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, df = asReal(dfp), one = 1, zero = 0;
01357 
01358     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01359         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01360     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01361     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01362     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01363     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01364     R_CheckStack();
01365 
01366     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01367     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01368     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01369     if (j)
01370         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01371     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01372     ansp = REAL(ans);
01373     GetRNGstate();
01374     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01375         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01376         std_rWishart_factor(df, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01377         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01378                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01379         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01380                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01381                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01382 
01383         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01384             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01385                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01386     }
01387 
01388     PutRNGstate();
01389     UNPROTECT(1);
01390     return ans;
01391 }
01392 
01393 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01394 
01403 static void MCMC_beta_u(SEXP x, double sigma)
01404 {
01405     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01406     int i1 = 1, j, p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01407     int pp1 = p + 1;
01408     double *V = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym),
01409         *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01410         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01411         *u = U_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01412     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01413     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01414     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01415     R_CheckStack();
01416 
01417     update_RX(x);
01418     if (V || muEta) {
01419         error(_("Update not yet written"));
01420     } else {                    /* Linear mixed model */
01421                                 /* Update the fixed effects */
01422         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01423         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x),
01424                         &pp1, del2, &i1);
01425         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fixef[j] += del2[j];
01426                                 /* Update the orthogonal random effects */
01427         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01428         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x),
01429                         &q, del2, &i1, one, del1, &i1);
01430         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01431         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01432         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01433     }
01434 }
01435 
01436 static void
01437 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01438 {
01439     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01440     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01441         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01442         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01443 
01444     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
01445     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
01446     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
01447     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
01448         int i, np1 = n + 1;
01449         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
01450         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
01451     }
01452 }
01453 
01454 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals, int trans)
01455 {
01456     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01457     int i, info, j, k, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST),
01458         *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
01459     double *rr = RANEF_SLOT(x),
01460         *scal, *var, *wfac, one = 1, zero = 0;
01461     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01462     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01463     R_CheckStack();
01464 
01465     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01466     scal = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01467     wfac = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01468     var = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01469     R_CheckStack();
01470     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01471         int nci = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01472         int ncisq = nci * nci, ncip1 = nci + 1;
01473         
01474         AZERO(scal, ncisq);
01475         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nl, &one, rr + Gp[i], &nl,
01476                         &zero, scal, &nci); 
01477         if (nci == 1) *scal = sqrt(*scal);
01478         else {
01479             safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", nci, 1e-7);
01480             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &nci, scal, &nci, &info);
01481             if (info)
01482                 error(_("scal matrix is not pd after safe_pd_matrix!"));
01483         }
01484                                 /* generate random factor from std Wishart */
01485         AZERO(wfac, ncisq);
01486         std_rWishart_factor((double) (nl - nci + 1), nci, 1, wfac);
01487                                 /* form and store variance-covariance matrix */
01488         F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "U", "T", "N", &nci, &nci,
01489                         &one, wfac, &nci, scal, &nci);
01490         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nci, &one, scal, &nci,
01491                         &zero, var, &nci);
01492         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) {
01493             *vals++ = (trans ? log(var[j * ncip1]) : var[j * ncip1]);
01494         }
01495         for (j = 1; j < nci; j++) {
01496             for (k = 0; k < j; k++) {
01497                 *vals++ = (trans ? atanh(var[k + j * nci]/
01498                                      sqrt(var[j * ncip1] * var[k * ncip1]))
01499                        : var[k + j * nci]);
01500             }
01501         }
01502         if (nci == 1) {
01503             *st[i] = sqrt(*var)/sigma;
01504         } else {
01505             double *sti = st[i];
01506 
01507             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) /* copy var to st[i] transposing */
01508                 for (k = j; k < nci; k++)
01509                     sti[k + j * nci] = var[j + k * nci];
01510                                 /* factor the variance-covariance matrix */
01511             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &nci, sti, &nci, &info);
01512             if (info)
01513                 error(_("new var-cov matrix is not positive definite!"));
01514             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) { /* convert to LDL' then TSST' */
01515                 for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01516                     sti[k + j * nci] /= sti[j * ncip1];
01517                 sti[j * ncip1] /= sigma;
01518             }
01519         }
01520     }
01521 }
01522 
01532 static R_INLINE double MCMC_sigma(const int* dims, const double* d)
01533 {
01534     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/rchisq(RDF(dims))) : 1);
01535 }
01536 
01549 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP savebp, SEXP nsampp, SEXP transp,
01550                   SEXP verbosep, SEXP deviancep)
01551 {
01552     SEXP Pars = PROTECT(mer_ST_getPars(x)), ans;
01553     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01554     int dPOS = dims[REML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS, i, j,
01555         nsamp = asInteger(nsampp),
01556         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS],
01557         saveb = asLogical(savebp), trans = asLogical(transp),
01558         verbose = asLogical(verbosep), dev = asLogical(deviancep);
01559     double *ansp, *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01560         *ranef = (double*)NULL;
01561     int nrbase = p + 1 + dims[np_POS]; /* rows always included */
01562     int nrtot = nrbase + dev + (saveb ? q : 0);
01563 
01564     if (nsamp <= 0) nsamp = 1;
01565     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nrtot, nsamp));
01566     ansp = REAL(ans);
01567     for (i = 0; i < nrtot * nsamp; i++) ansp[i] = NA_REAL;
01568     GetRNGstate();
01569     if (verbose) Rprintf("%12s %14s\n", "sigma", "deviance");
01570     if (saveb) ranef = RANEF_SLOT(x);
01571 
01572     for (i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01573         double *col = ansp + i * nrtot, sigma;
01574                                 /* simulate and store new value of sigma */
01575         sigma = MCMC_sigma(dims, d);
01576         col[p] = (trans ? 2 * log(sigma) : sigma * sigma);
01577         update_ranef(x);        /* Conditional estimates of beta and u */
01578         MCMC_beta_u(x, sigma);  /* Update beta */
01579         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) col[j] = fixef[j]; /* Store beta */
01580         if (saveb) {                               /* store b */
01581             update_ranef(x);
01582             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) col[nrbase + dev + j] = ranef[j];
01583         }
01584         MCMC_ST(x, sigma, col + p + 1, trans);
01585                                 /* Refactor and evaluate deviance */
01586         /* FIXME: This deviance should be for sigma, beta, b, ST */
01587         if (dev) col[nrbase] = d[dPOS]; 
01588         if (verbose) Rprintf("%12.6g %14.8g\n", sigma, d[dPOS]);
01589     }
01590     PutRNGstate();
01591                                 /* Restore pars, refactor, etc. */
01592     mer_ST_setPars(x, Pars);
01593 /*     lmer_update_dev(x); */
01594 /*     lmer_update_effects(x); */
01595     UNPROTECT(2);
01596     return ans;
01597 }
01598 
01599 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01600 
01601 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01602 #endif  
01603 
01617 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
01618 {
01619     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
01620     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
01621     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
01622         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
01623                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
01624                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
01625     return 0;
01626 }
01627 
01640 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
01641 {
01642     int ll;
01643 
01644     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
01645         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
01646                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
01647     return 0;
01648 }
01649 
01658 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01659 {
01660     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01661         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01662         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01663         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01664         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym);
01665     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01666     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01667         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01668     int nv = n * s;
01669     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym)),
01670         A =  AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
01671     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01672     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01673     R_CheckStack();
01674                                 /* check lengths */
01675     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01676         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01677     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01678         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01679     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01680         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01681     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01682         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01683         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01684     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01685         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01686         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01687     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01688         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01689     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01690         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01691     if (A->nrow != q || A->ncol != nv)
01692         return mkString(_("Slot A must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01693     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01694     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01695     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01696     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01697     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01698     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_pWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01699     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01700     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01701     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01702     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01703     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_VSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01704     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01705     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01706     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01707     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RZXSym, q, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01708     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXSym, p, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01709 
01710     nq = 0;
01711     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01712         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01713         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01714         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01715             return
01716                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01717         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01718             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01719         if (!isFactor(fli))
01720             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01721         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01722     }
01723     if (q != nq)
01724         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01725     return ScalarLogical(1);
01726 }
01727 
01728 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01729 
01739 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01740 {
01741     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01742     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01743         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01744         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01745         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01746         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01747     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01748 
01749     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01750     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01751     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01752         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01753         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01754             F[i] = 0;
01755             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01756         } else {
01757             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01758                 F[i] = 0;
01759                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01760             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01761                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01762                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01763                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01764                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01765                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01766                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01767                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01768                             int ii = ai[k];
01769                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01770                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01771                         }
01772                     }
01773                 }
01774             }
01775         }
01776         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01777     }
01778     return ans;
01779 }
01780 
01781 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01794 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01795 {
01796     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01797     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01798     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01799         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01800         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01801     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01802       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01803     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01804         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01805     R_CheckStack();
01806     
01807     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01808     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01809         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01810         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01811         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01812     }
01813     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01814     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01815     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01816     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01817         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01818         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01819                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01820         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01821         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01822             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01823         }
01824         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01825             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01826         }
01827     
01828         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01829         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01830         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01831         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01832             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01833             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01834             if (S) {
01835                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01836                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01837                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01838                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01839                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01840             }
01841             if (D) {
01842                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01843                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01844             }
01845             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01846             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01847             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01848                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01849                                       * evaluated */
01850         } 
01851     }
01852     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01853     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01854     UNPROTECT(1);
01855     return ans;
01856 }
01857 
01858 SEXP spR_update_mu(SEXP x)
01859 {
01860     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01861     int n = dims[n_POS];
01862     double
01863         *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
01864         *eta = Calloc(n, double),
01865         *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
01866         *offset = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_offsetSym),
01867         *srwt = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym)),
01868         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
01869         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01870         one[] = {1, 0};
01871     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
01872     CHM_DN cbeta = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01873         ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, n, 1);
01874     R_CheckStack();
01875     
01876     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
01877     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 1 /* trans */, one, one, cbeta, ceta, &c))
01878         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
01879     lme4_muEta(mu, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)), eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
01880     lme4_varFunc(REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_varSym)), mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
01881 
01882     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
01883     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01884         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * srwt[i];
01885         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
01886     }
01887 
01888     Free(eta);
01889     return R_NilValue;
01890 }
01891 
01892 SEXP spR_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01893 {
01894     int *zp, m, n, nnz, verb = asInteger(verbP);
01895     double *Zcp, *Ztx,
01896         *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
01897         *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01898         *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
01899         *muEta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)),
01900         *pWt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_pWtSym),
01901         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
01902         *srwt = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym)),
01903         *tmp, *tmp2, *var = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_varSym)),
01904         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01905         cfac, crit, one[] = {1, 0},
01906         step, wrss_old, zero[] = {0, 0};
01907     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
01908     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01909     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, Zt->ncol, 1), ctmp, sol;
01910     R_CheckStack();
01911 
01912     
01913     zp = (int*)Zt->p;
01914     m = Zt->nrow;
01915     n = Zt->ncol;
01916     nnz = zp[n];
01917     Zcp = Calloc(nnz, double);
01918     Ztx = (double*)Zt->x;
01919     tmp = Calloc(m, double);
01920     tmp2 = Calloc(m, double);
01921     ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, m, 1);
01922     cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)m);
01923     R_CheckStack();
01924 
01925     spR_update_mu(x);
01926     for (int i = 0; ; i++) {
01927         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
01928         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01929             srwt[j] = sqrt((pWt ? pWt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
01930             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
01931             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
01932             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++)
01933                 Zcp[p] = srwt[j] * muEta[j] * Ztx[p];
01934         }
01935         Zt->x = (void*)Zcp;
01936         if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Zt, zero, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
01937             error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
01938                   c.status, L->minor, L->n);
01939         wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01940                                 /* tmp := Zt %*% muEta %*% var %*% wtdResid */
01941         M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01942         Memcpy(tmp2, tmp, m);
01943         apply_perm(tmp, tmp2, (int*)L->Perm, m);
01944                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01945         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01946             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01947         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01948         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01949                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01950         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, m) / wrss_old;
01951         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01952                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01953         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01954             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01955         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01956         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01957 
01958         Memcpy(tmp2, fixef, m);
01959         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01960             for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) fixef[j] = tmp2[j] + step * tmp[j];
01961             spR_update_mu(x);
01962             if (verb < 0)
01963                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01964                         i, step, crit, d[wrss_POS], wrss_old, fixef[1], fixef[2]);
01965             if (d[wrss_POS] < wrss_old) {
01966                 wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01967                 break;
01968             }
01969         }
01970         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01971     }
01972     Free(tmp2);
01973     Free(Zcp);
01974     Free(tmp);
01975     return R_NilValue;
01976 }
